column4: hi everyone i got error in compiling wubi like cd src/metadl; make
Error: libcurl is missing. Please run "make prerequisites".
did you try running 'make prerequisites' as that error is suggesting you do?
please *do not* paste multiple lines of error text in the channel. Please use a pastebin
it's very easy to use, just paste the text into the web page and post the link to it in here - http://paste.ubuntu.com/
im developing customised ubuntu so i want to compile wubi to integreate into it ...do u know how to do it???
No, it's not something I've done. I was just pointing you to use pastebin so it'll be more likely you'll get help from others
I can't help you but others might be able to
explain what you have tried so far, and exactly what is going wrong. Use pastebin to provide errors/output from any commands you have tried. It will be more likely you will get help that way

i have read one tutorial from forum http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=1062504 and its for hardy and when i compile it using make command than i tried make prere...that u said but it gives error of wineprefixcreate not found error
don't ask me, ask the whole channel :) Explain everything in one single message to the whole channel. If you don't get any help, wait a while and repeat it.
That's better, but include a pastebin with the exact errors you are getting so people can read it
What you just did was correct :)
